short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use saasdocs capture to seamlessly capture your app workflow and automatically generate comprehensive documentation.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
saasdocs is a very intuitive tool to create high-quality help texts for your software - and all with very little effort. Based on simple feature descriptions, you can use saasdocs to generate precise and user-friendly articles. This Browser Extension This browser extension is the heart of saasdocs, which allows you to easily record the steps to be described in your software.

Please note!: For the functionality of the extension, a paid plan on saasdocs.io is required.

New Features:
- Easy context generation Recording the workflow to be described has never been easier than now thanks to our Google Chrome extension!
-Translated articles! Have your articles translated into different languages such as French, German, Spanish or many more directly after recording.
- Always up to date. Workflows in your application changes and needs to be updated? No problem, the article and all its translations are translated easily and fully automatically.
- Intelligent button recognition. Whether you click on it or not - saasdocs recognizes important buttons in your application and provides direct reference to them in the article.
- Powerful API. By developers for developers - Of course, you can access all your articles and apps and write your own integrations via a powerful API.
- Developed and hosted in Germany. we take responsibility for you and your data. Developed and hosted according to European data protection standards in Germany.

Unlock your software's true potential with our saasdocs. From intelligent generation of manuals to real-time self-improving articles and top-notch evaluation technology, we have everything you need to streamline your workflows and achieve high productivity.
